property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: The runtime framework for executing MapReduce jobs. Can be one of local, classic or yarn.

property.name: mapreduce.map.memory.mb
property.description: Larger resource limit for maps. -- chetan

property.name: mapred.map.java.opts
property.description: Larger heap-size for child jvms of maps.

configuration.property: mapreduce.reduce.java.opts -Xmx1024M Larger heap-size for child jvms of reduces.

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.mb
property.description: Higher memory-limit while sorting data for efficiency.

property.name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
property.description: More streams merged at once while sorting files.

property.name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.parallelcopies
property.description: Higher number of parallel copies run by reduces to fetch outputs from very large number of maps.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir
property.description: Directory where history files are written by MapReduce jobs.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.done-dir
property.description: Directory where history files are managed by the MR JobHistory Server.
